com.mobius.vdrapi
Interface IPageList

All Known Implementing Classes:
PageList
public interface IPageList

This interface when implemented maintains a page list within a class. It is the backbone of the INeedObjectWithPageList and IHoldPageList interfaces. This is interface actually contains the data from each page. It typically supports the INeedObjectWithPageList with the call to "init" and "add." It supports related classes to implementor of a IHoldPageList interface to use calls getFirst and getNext to obtain the list page data. Note the example usage below: DocumentViewer is an example of a class that implements IHoldPageList. CreatePageGroupCommand implements the interface INeedObjectWithPageList. This allows DocumentViewer to store and retrieve the list of pages downloaded by the CreatePageGroupCommand. To turn the page list interface on DocumentViewer calls setObjectWithPageList. CreatePageGroupCommand checks to see if page list was requested by the caller in this case it was requested by DocumentViewer. Since the page list was requested, CreatePageGroupCommand initializes the page list and passes it back to DocumentViewer by calling setPageList method of DocumentViewer. In addition CreatePageGroupCommand populates the page list as it downloads pages inside the execute method. PrinterControl is an example of a class that has a "has a" realtionship with DocumentViewer. To obtain the list of pages downloaded by the CreatePageGroupCommand, PrinterControl calls DocumentViewer's getPageList method. Once the PrinterControl has a copy of the page list, PrinterControl can use getFirst and/or getNext to examine the list of pages downloaded.

See Also:
INeedObjectWithPageList, IHoldPageList

Field Summary
static int NO_PAGE_DATA
          Return NO_PAGE_DATA inside of getFirst and getNext when the end of the list has been reached

Field Detail

NO_PAGE_DATA

public static final int NO_PAGE_DATA
Return NO_PAGE_DATA inside of getFirst and getNext when the end of the list has been reached

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

add

public void add(PageListData pageListData)
         throws ViewDirectException
Adds page information to the list. This method must add PageListData items to a list using a "first in, first out" order.

ViewDirectException

getFirst

public PageListData getFirst()
Interface for getting data about pages that where downloaded. Must return PageListData item where the relativePage equals NO_PAGE_DATA the indicate the end of list to the caller. Be sure to call getFirst to start things off. A typical use, traversing the list of pages would be coded as follows: PageListData pagehdr=getFirst(); while (pagehdr.relativePage!=NO_PAGE_DATA) { pagehdr=getNext(); } // while

getNext

public PageListData getNext()
Interface for getting data about pages that where downloaded. Must return PageListData item where the relativePage equals NO_PAGE_DATA the indicate the end of list to the caller. Call after calling getFirst.

init

public void init()
Initializes the page list by creating an empty container. This method must start the list from scratch.
